display_name: Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale: Unfinished tasks really bother me
description:
Item from the Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale with a range of 1 (Strongly Agree) to 4 (Strongly Disagree). Reverse coded so higher scores indicate more impulsivity. [Cyders et al 2014 (PMID: 24636739)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4055534/)

Question text: For each statement, please indicate how much you agree or disagree with the statement.

[Search for all Short UPPS-P Impulsive Behavior Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=upps)
